TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BehaviorService extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class BehaviorService Implements IDisposable
public ref class BehaviorService sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 在设计器中管理用户界面。

span.span: Manages user interface in the designer.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是创建，它将透明窗口添加到设计器的框架。When the is created, it adds a transparent window over the designer frame. 可以然后使用此窗口来呈现用户界面元素，调用对象，以及捕获所有鼠标消息。The can then use this window to render user interface elements, called objects, as well as catch all mouse messages. 这种方式，可以控制设计器的行为。In this way, the can control designer behavior. 类支持的行为堆栈，拖放到这些推入对象。The class supports a behavior stack, onto which objects can be pushed. 当通过透明的窗口中，在一条消息已截获可以将消息发送到堆栈的顶部。When a message is intercepted through the transparent window, the can send the message to the at the top of the stack. 这使不同的用户界面模式，具体取决于当前压入。This enables different user interface modes depending on the currently pushed . 用于呈现所有对象，例如选择边框、 大小调整控点和智能标记。The is used to render all objects, such as selection borders, sizing handles, and smart tags. 还控制许多设计时行为，例如使用对齐线、 拖动和选择。The also controls many design-time behaviors, such as using snaplines, dragging, and selecting. 有关详细信息，请参阅[行为服务概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建你自己基于响应用户单击的类。The following code example demonstrates how to create your own based class that responds to user clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件之后随即启动拖放操作。The raises the event immediately before it starts a drag-and-drop operation. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 修饰工具窗口是驻留在设计器的帧之上的透明窗口。The adorner window is a transparent window that resides on top of the designer's frame. 通过使用此窗口以便截获所有消息。This window is used by the to intercept all messages. 它还可以在其上绘制一个统一的画布作为。It also serves as a unified canvas on which to paint a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.
